w:r.w:t: fifth letter and fifth vowel of the Sinhala script
of a people and their language; English
like covering outside the spathe of the inflorescence of coconut
gause like cover situated between spathe and the inflorescence of coconut
like fleshy cover of a dud jack seed
to pass or spend time; to elapse
bow made out of the stem of sugar cane
to convey ideas by means of signs
